title: My House
description: A single-level PK3 for Doom II that begins as a simple recreation of a childhood home but transforms into a deeply unsettling psychological horror experience with non-Euclidean geometry, mysterious secrets, and layers of hidden content that players are still discovering.

screenshots.caption: The opening shot of the House's exterior.
The living room where you'll face the first few monsters.
The upstairs master bedroom, with the yellow keycard in shot.

notes: Requires GZDoom with hardware renderer. Use myhouse.pk3, not .wad file.
